Posts.Title: Chemo in pill form

Posts.Content: Heya, Just wondering if anyone had any experience with Chemo in pill form? If so, would you mind popping in to the following thread and helping Christus out with her questions about what they are called and which one is the "better" one? https://community.macmillan.org.uk/cancer_types/bone-secondary-cancer/f/bone-secondary-cancer-forum/164573/breast-cancer-with-bone-mets?Page=0#1232240 If you read through the thread, you'll see what she's been told and that she's having trouble with the site. So any first hand experience of any of the chemo pills that you care to share would be much appreciated. Thanks in advance for any help you can give! Lass Xx
Posts.Title: Chemo in pill form

Posts.Content: Hi I went to one of these at the end of my chemo .. I really enjoyed it and the ladies were lovely (although to be honest thought the lesson with mascara was a bit pointless as I had about 2 eyelashes left on each eye) anything that keeps your spirits up is a good thing..
